name: Simutek Package One
overview: Simutek Package One is a collection of 5 games made by Simutek, released by Adventure International. Graphic Trek 2000 - A Star Trek simulation, where the player has a limited time frame to explore multiple different quadrants, collect resources, and destroy Klingon vessels. Star Wars - A shooting game, where the player moves a cross hair to shoot incoming alien vessels. The player must first destroy 15 tie fighters, then the dreaded Darth Vader. Finally, they must fire a torpedo at the exhaust tube at the bottom of the screen, and quickly escape. Players are awarded point by how quickly they destroy enemy ships. Space Target - Alien vessels move across the screen from left to right. The player fires a missile from the bottom center of the screen, and must direct it into the alien vessel. After an alien vessel is hit, the pilot parachutes to safety, and the player can shoot the escaping pilot for bonus points. Invasion Worg - A resource management game, where the player must move their assault and defense forces between a series of 10 planets to repel the alien Worg invasion. Saucers - Another shooting game, the player controls a cross hair, and attempts to shoot as many alien saucers they can while a counter reads from 100.
